about_the_game:
Nova Tokyo Awaits

Nova Tokyo has risen like a phoenix from the ruins of the old capital. While it lives a mechanical life, the city hackers — specialists in hacking corporate systems — test their skills in ultimate challenges.
Those who are reckless enough, dare to participate in clandestine competitions — the so-called Hackons.
The participants have to hack the protection of the other hacker. Their bodies are at stake: lose in the Hackon and you must strip in front of your rival.

AKUMA! Bone-crashing rhythm action levels mixed with gorgeous visual novel elements. All together AKUMA delivers a unique cyberpunk setting that combines Japanese city pop culture, the aftermath of popped financial bubbles and the highlights of a futuristic capitalist society at its prime!

Become a Champion among the City Hackers

The main championship of this risky sport is held by the sukeban girls from the Shingi-Dan Gang under the lead of Akari, a tough nut to crack. She is vigilant to ensure that the contestants comply with the Hackon ethics — the ban on distributing photos of naked rivals.

The champion of the Hackon is rightfully considered to be the most powerful hacker in Nova Tokyo.
For many years, this title has been held by a talented hacker named Mira. She's not going to give up, even under the pressure of other worthy opponents!

One of them is Typhoon, a promising city hacker. Her goal is nothing less than an absolute victory. She is ready to do anything to achieve it.
What are her motives? Why is winning so important to her? And how far is she willing to go?

Your Rivals


Sakura — Famous Pop Idol
A former member of the popular girl group No Satisfaction Girls, who began a successful solo career.
This cheerful girl is an exemplary idol on the stage. Just don't let her playful personality and pretty appearance fool you. Behind the scenes, she is a promising city hacker. She takes part in the Hackons for the thrill, even though her agency forbids it.
Favorite music genre: Synthwave/Eurobeat

Akari — Sukeban Gang Leader
A formidable and stern leader of the Shingi-Dan Gang, who is behind the organization of the Hackons.
She rules them with an iron fist and makes sure that no one breaks the strict rules. She is always ready to take down another upstart. It is dangerous to cross her path — few have left her without experiencing the bitterness of humiliating defeat.
Favorite music genre: Trance/Psytrance

Mira — Nova Tokyo Champion
It's virtually impossible to guess that this shy girl is in fact a legendary hacker and the current champion of Nova Tokyo.
It’s hard to earn her trust. Her protection from hacking is unmatched in the whole city. She has never lost a single Haсkon and has held the title for several years. And she is ready to fight to the end to protect her title.
Favorite music genre: IDnB/IDM

.… and Unknown AKUMA Taker
This strange bug continues to haunt the Typhoon no matter what system she gets into.
Who’s this girl? Why is she so interested in Typhoon? And why does she look so familiar?
Favorite music genre: Lolicore/Breakcore
(ﾒ﹏ﾒ)

Key Features

  • Extraordinary story about lost people in the near future
    Immerse yourself in a sophisticated future ruled by the augmentation vogue and hacking challenges. Uncover the truth about yourself and find out exactly why you should become a champion among the city hackers.
  • High-quality of lore and character art
    Original 4 rivals in the basic version of the game with their own stories and motivations.
  • Original soundtrack special for AKUMA
    7 musicians created perfect tracks of various genres: Intelligent Drum and Bass, Breakcore, Lolicore, Intelligent Dance Music, Synthwave, Psytrance and Dreampunk for stage & screen.
  • More than 3 hours of story, rhythm action gameplay, and boss fights
    12 rhythm action levels with 3 difficulty levels.
